altername_name: Yamanote-sen Meimei 100 Shuunen Kinen: Densha de Go! Tokubetsu Hen: Fukkatsu! Shouwa no Yamanote-sen
name: Densha de Go! Tokubetsu-hen: Fukkatsu Shouwa no Yamanotesen
overview: Densha de Go! Tokubetsu-hen: Fukkatsu Shouwa no Yamanotesen is a Simulation game published by Square Enix, which was released in Japan in 2010.
